question.title: For Loop - 1
question.content:
You are given a number n, you need to print its multiplication table in a single line.

Examples:

Input: n = 5
Output: 5 10 15 20 25 30 35 40 45 50
Input: n = 6
Output: 6 12 18 24 30 36 42 48 54 60

rephrased.body: Given an integer *n*, generate its multiplication table up to 10, displaying the results in a single line, separated by spaces.

testcases.explanation: The multiplication table of 5 up to 10 is generated.
The multiplication table of 6 up to 10 is generated.

hints:
Java:

for(int i = 1; i < 11; i++){
    System.out.print(i * n + " ");
}

CPP:

for(int i = 1; i < 11; i++){
    cout << i * n << " ";
}

 

C:

for(int i = 1; i < 11; i++){
    printf("%d ", i * n);
}
